name: assignment-ui-automation
description: This is a UI automation assignment project developed using Playwright and TypeScript.

scripts.test: npx playwright test --headed && npx playwright show-report
scripts.visual-test: npx playwright test visual.spec.ts --headed && npx playwright show-report
scripts.e2e-test: npx playwright test e2e.spec.ts --headed && npx playwright show-report
scripts.accessibility-test: npx playwright test accessibility.spec.ts --headed && npx playwright show-report
scripts.visual-headless-test: npx playwright test visual.spec.ts && npx playwright show-report
scripts.e2e-headless-test: npx playwright test e2e.spec.ts && npx playwright show-report
scripts.accessibility-headless-test: npx playwright test accessibility.spec.ts && npx playwright show-report
scripts.headless-test: npx playwright test && npx playwright show-report

author: Mahendiran M
